item.title: About Me
item.description: I am an enthusiast of math and engineering who loves to challenge myself to reach new heights. I find immense joy in exploring the world through travel and nature’s wonders while hiking. My mission is to make learning enjoyable through my blog, a platform where I share my knowledge and adventures. Join me on this journey of endless curiosity and exploration!

item.title: Test
item.description: test this is a test file $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$ $$ x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a} $$
